row.Name: Action Builder, Action Packs, Plugins, PluginManager, Marketplace, Package Manager;TBD;;3;
Automic Product Roadmap(Robert Schausberger, Kaj Wierda) + BlackBird;Y;MKG;1;"JBD; MVE; KHA; PPE; JCB; MTD;KAZ"
Continuous Delivery @ Automic(Christopher Hejl);TBD;;1;"MVE; KHA; PPE; MTD"
DevOps Introduction, Trends & Concepts(David Jungwirth);TBD;MKG;1;"MVE; KHA; JCB"
Dollar Universe (roadmap);Y;Caloone;1;"JBD; KHA; PPE; JCB; MTD";Y
Installer, DB & setup changes;Y;PS;3;"JCR; CDP; OBP;KAZ"
The future of RA field solutions(Robert Schausberger,Stefan Leitich);Y;MKG;1;

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred :DELETE_VAR "EXCEL" :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(VVIESUP03_WS112_X64_01_SYS,"&CSV1#",,"COL=DELIMITER,DELIMITER=*;*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &line#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : P &line# : PUT_VAR EXCEL,"&line#", :ENDPROCESS
:SET &HND2# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(VVIESUP03_WS112_X64_01_SYS,"&CSV2#",,"COL=DELIMITER,DELIMITER=*;*") :PROCESS &HND2# : SET &line2#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND2#) : PUT_VAR EXCEL,"&line2#", : P &line2# :ENDPROCESS
:SET &JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(EXCEL) :PROCESS &JOBS# : SET &JOB# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#) echo &JOB# >> C:\Temp\result.csv
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &JOBS#
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
